description: Create new Passcode Profile for configurations Mobile Profile objects.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: allow-simple-passcode
body.description: The passcode length is 4 and only numeric values allowed.

body.name: min-passcode-length
body.description: Minimum passcode length - relevant if "allow-simple-passcode" is disable.

body.name: require-alphanumeric-passcode
body.description: Require alphanumeric characters in the passcode - relevant if "allow-simple-passcode" is disable.

body.name: min-passcode-complex-characters
body.description: Minimum number of complex characters (if "require-alphanumeric-passcode" is enabled). The number of the complex characters cannot be greater than number of the passcode length.

body.name: force-passcode-expiration
body.description: Enable/disable expiration date to the passcode.

body.name: passcode-expiration-period
body.description: The period in days after which the passcode will expire.

body.name: enable-inactivity-time-lock
body.description: Lock the device if app is inactive.

body.name: max-inactivity-time-lock
body.description: Time without user input before passcode must be re-entered (in minutes).

body.name: enable-passcode-failed-attempts
body.description: Exit after few failures in passcode verification.

body.name: passcode-history
body.description: Number of passcodes that will be kept in history.

success.name: name
success.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

success.name: allow-simple-passcode
success.description: The passcode length is 4 and only numeric values are allowed.

success.name: min-passcode-length
success.description: Minimum passcode length - relevant if "allow-simple-passcode" is disabled.

success.name: min-passcode-complex-characters
success.description: Minimum number of complex characters (if "require-alphanumeric-passcode" is enabled).

success.name: require-alphanumeric-passcode
success.description: Require alphanumeric characters in the passcode - relevant if "allow-simple-passcode" is disable.

success.name: force-passcode-expiration
success.description: Enable/disable expiration date of the passcode.

success.name: passcode-expiration-period
success.description: The period in days after which the passcode will expire.

success.name: enable-inactivity-time-lock
success.description: Lock the device if app is inactive.

success.name: max-inactivity-time-lock
success.description: Time without user input before passcode must be re-entered (in minutes).

success.name: enable-passcode-failed-attempts
success.description: Exit after few failures in passcode verification.

success.name: passcode-history
success.description: Number of passcodes that will be kept in history.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.
